title: Average Value of SQRT x over interval

content.question: The average (mean) value of<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the square root of x"> <semantics> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaGcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaWcbeaaaaa@374D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> over the interval <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaeyizImQaamiEaiabgsMiJkaaikdaaaa@3BF3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="one third times the square root of 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msqrt> <mn>2</mn> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaadaGcaaWdaeaa peGaaGOmaaWcbeaaaaa@38D2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="one half times the square root of 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <msqrt> <mn>2</mn> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaadaGcaaWdaeaa peGaaGOmaaWcbeaaaaa@38D1@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="two thirds times the square root of 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>2</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msqrt> <mn>2</mn> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaadaGcaaWdaeaa peGaaGOmaaWcbeaaaaa@38D3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
